description: This file defines API endpoints related to 'notes' within a travel planning backend. It includes CRUD operations such as listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes associated with trips, using FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and Pydantic schemas.

classes.name: NoteUpdate
classes.description: Schema for updating a note, allowing partial updates to the 'content' field.

classes.name: NoteListResponse
classes.description: Schema for paginated list response containing notes.

methods.name: Trip _get_trip_or_404(db: Session, trip_id: uuid.UUID)
methods.description: Fetches a trip by its UUID or raises a 404 HTTPException if not found.

methods.name: Note _get_note_or_404(db: Session, trip_id: uuid.UUID, note_id: uuid.UUID)
methods.description: Fetches a note scoped to a trip by its UUID or raises a 404 HTTPException if not found.

methods.name: NoteRead create_note( trip_id: uuid.UUID, payload: NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
Response delete_note( trip_id: uuid.UUID, note_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
NoteRead get_note( trip_id: uuid.UUID, note_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

NoteListResponse list_notes( trip_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of notes to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of notes to skip"), )
NoteRead update_note( trip_id: uuid.UUID, note_id: uuid.UUID, payload: NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: _get_note_or_404
ctags.pattern: /^def _get_note_or_404(db: Session, trip_id: uuid.UUID, note_id: uuid.UUID) -> Note:$/

ctags.name: create_note
ctags.signature: ( trip_id: uuid.UUID, payload: NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: delete_note
ctags.signature: ( trip_id: uuid.UUID, note_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: get_note
ctags.signature: ( trip_id: uuid.UUID, note_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: items
ctags.pattern: /^    items: list[NoteRead] = Field(..., description="Notes in the current page")$/

ctags.name: limit
ctags.pattern: /^    limit: int = Field(..., description="Page size limit used for this response", ge=1, le=100)$/

ctags.name: list_notes
ctags.signature: ( trip_id: uuid.UUID, db: Session = Depends(get_db), limit: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of notes to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of notes to skip"), )

ctags.name: offset
ctags.pattern: /^    offset: int = Field(..., description="Offset used for this response", ge=0)$/

ctags.name: total
ctags.pattern: /^    total: int = Field(..., description="Total number of notes available for the trip (ignores p/

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.signature: ( trip_id: uuid.UUID, note_id: uuid.UUID, payload: NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
